wikipedia_page.main: Steven Barnett Rosenberg (born 1968 in Epping, Essex) is a British TV and radio journalist. He is currently the BBC's Moscow correspondent.

In June 2013, Putin attended a televised rally of the All-Russia People's Front where he was elected head of the movement,Putin becomes Popular Front for Russia leader, Interfax-Ukraine (13 June 2013) which was set up in 2011. According to journalist Steve Rosenberg, the movement is intended to "reconnect the Kremlin to the Russian people" and one day, if necessary, replace the increasingly unpopular United Russia party that currently backs Putin.
